Description: Lid from a terracotta coffin; applied facial-detail and arms.
Curator's comments: Cotelle-Michel, Les sarcophages en terre cuite (Dijon, 2004), 253, II-E-2 Bissing, Intorno a una testa fittile di sarcofago conservata nel museuoegiziano di Firenze, in Studi dedicati alla memoria di Ippolito Rossellini nel primo centenario della morte, Florence 1945, 61 fig C. Kuchman, Egyptian Clay Anthropoid Coffins, Serapis 4 1977,16. Petrie, Tanis part II, 1988, 20-21, pl.1,3,15,16: Petrie, Ten years digging in Egypt, 1892, 68. Petrie, Tools and Weapons, 1917, 32 pl. 11, 39. Rowe,The Topography and History of Beth- Shan, 1930, 32, 39 note 67. Watzinger, Denkmaler Palastinas, Leipzig 1933, I, 40. Wright, Philistines Coffins and Mercenaries, BASOR 22, 58 fig 4.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2003 17 Jul-12 Oct, Valencia, Instituto Valenciano de Arte Moderno, The Eyesight and the Vision
